projects.name: Invoicing App
projects.description: The purpose of this project was to build a web app for a user to be able to manage their invoices. This was a group project built with JavaSscript, HTML and tailwindcss using the React.js library. These technologies were used as React components made groupwork easier to manage, and made merging different sections smoother. The app accesses an API to retrieve and post the invoice data. The user can filter and sort their list of invoices, view a particular invoice, mark it as paid or cancelled, and create a new invoice.

projects.name: Bookswap API
projects.description: The purpose of this project was to build a RESTful API for an existing front-end project. This was a group project built with PHP, using object oriented programming and the Laravel framework. The API follows REST principles to interact with the database we created. Laravel helped us structure the use of the MVC design pattern to interact with our database. The user can get all books, filter, search, add a book, add a review, claim a book or return a book.

projects.name: Music Player
projects.description: The purpose of this project was to code the back-end of a music player using object orientated programing in PHP and MySQL database queries. The app accesses a database of artists, albums and songs which are displayed on the app in various ways. The user can track song play counts, see which albums are most popular, and favourite songs.

projects.name: Web Portfolio
projects.description: The purpose of this project was to build a web based portfolio that clearly displays my projects. This project is built with JavaSscript, HTML and tailwindcss using the React.js library. Responsive design is used to ensure accessibility across different devices, and a JSON file is used to fetch data about my projects.
